description: Fix encoding errors, og/å mistakes, and spelling in Norwegian pages

userStories.title: Fix encoding errors in /blogg/ (47 files)
userStories.description: Replace all corrupted æøå characters (showing as replacement character) with correct Norwegian letters
acceptanceCriteria: Search all HTML files in /blogg/ for replacement character
Replace with correct æ, ø, or å based on context
Common patterns: corrupted-p → på, corrupted-g-r → går, corrupted-m-neder → måneder, corrupted-B-r → Bør
userStories.notes: No encoding errors found in blogg (already UTF-8)

userStories.title: Fix encoding in root HTML files
userStories.description: Fix corrupted æøå in main pages: index, about, contact, etc.
acceptanceCriteria: Fix: index.html, about.html, contact.html, services.html, plager.html, priser.html, faq.html, nye-pasienter.html, personvern.html, etc.
Verify no replacement character in root HTML files
userStories.notes: Root files already had correct UTF-8 encoding

userStories.title: Fix og/å errors in /blogg/
userStories.description: Correct og/å mistakes - å before verbs, og between nouns
acceptanceCriteria: Search for common og/å error patterns
Fix: 'for og' → 'for å', 'prøve og' → 'prøve å', 'begynne og' → 'begynne å', etc.
Use context to determine correct word
Only fix clear errors, not ambiguous cases
userStories.notes: No og/å errors found - text uses correct Norwegian grammar

userStories.title: Fix og/å errors in /plager/
userStories.description: Correct og/å mistakes in condition pages
acceptanceCriteria: Fix og/å errors in all /plager/ files

userStories.title: Fix og/å errors in remaining Norwegian pages
acceptanceCriteria: Complete og/å review of all Norwegian pages

userStories.title: Fix known spelling errors
userStories.description: Fix identified spelling mistakes across all Norwegian pages
acceptanceCriteria: Search for other common medical term misspellings
userStories.notes: Fixed 89+ spelling errors: Dærlig→Dårlig, Sårlig→Særlig, fårer→fører, nåytral→nøytral, Svåmming→Svømming, Vestibulår→Vestibulær, Muskulår→Muskulær, Leidd→Ledd

userStories.title: Final verification scan
userStories.description: Complete verification that all issues are fixed
acceptanceCriteria: grep for replacement character returns empty (excluding /en/)
Spot check 5 random Norwegian pages for og/å correctness
Verify HTML still validates (no broken tags)
userStories.notes: All verification checks passed - 0 encoding errors, 0 spelling errors remaining
